CIF.Text: CIF, 2004, c. 22, in force on assent 14.05.2004 except:

Item.Text: — Part 4 (ss. 15 to 24) in force 31.01.2005 see SI/2005-6, s. 18(1) deemed in force 18.03.2003 see s. 18(2), [see also the application provision for this Part, s. 24(1)];
— s. 29(1) is deemed in force 01.02.2004 see s. 29(2);
— s. 32(1) is deemed in force 31.01.2004 see s. 32(2);
— ss. 37(1) and (2) are deemed in force 01.02.2004 see s. 37(3);
— s. 39(6) is deemed in force 01.02.2004 see s. 39(9)
See also various application provisions throughout

CIF.Text: CIF, 2005, c. 7, s. 8 in force on assent 10.03.2005
CIF, 2005, c. 30, s. 86 in force on assent 29.06.2005
